data.description: CAN YOU ESCAPE THE BUNKER? You've survived a nuclear war - now it's payback time for Klaus Von Klensch, mastermind of the apocalypse! Sneak past or destroy his robot sentries as you search for the bunker's reactor core. Trigger a meltdown and GTFO again - in FIVE MINUTES! With only a handful of weapons and tools (Plasma Pistol, EMP grenade, Locator, Adrenochrome Booster, and of course Toilet Brush) you'll need quick reactions and orbs of steel to succeed in this fun ROGUELITE stealth and survival shooter!

changelog.change_log:
Fixes a bug with version 0.3.3 which prevents player exiting the bunker.
Minor improvements to Spider clone tank.

Added 2 'hideout' areas - entering will throw sentries off your tail.
Minor bug fixes and improvements.

Hiding behind locker doors now throws sentries off your trail.
Minor tweaks to various geometry.

Fixed: wall with missing collider
Added: Mech now shoots physics projectiles
Added: Door glass now breaks when shot
Added: Barrels are now destructible and cause damage when exploding

Elevator control panels improved.
Added Smooth Rotation option in Player Settings.
Small tweaks & fixes.

Replaced: Toilet brush (aquamarine, used) > toilet brush (red, clean).
Collision SFX added to Locator.
Added player VO for big falls.
Updated: Plasma Pistol ammo display red when depleted
Fixed Bug: Player can exit elevator when doors are shut
Added: Elevator in Reactor Core (now you don't have to climb all the way to the upper level - but you will miss the bonus Health pickup)!

Added depth to start Scene logo.
Bug fixed: Headshot can no longer be triggered if you first hit body of Sentry. 
Improvements to environment / room layouts.
Optimised more colliders.
Fixed several issues with VO and audio.

First pass scoring, You now get points for: 

Staying hidden (increments till seen)
Shooting stuff
Overloading the reactor
Escaping

Updated Main Menu:
Select Bunker now has Random, Daily, and Certified-Tested options.

Added more VO.
Improvements to environment / room layouts.
Optimised some colliders.

Added warm-up sfx to give warning before Mech shoots.

Crates now provide shelter from damage when Mech shoots.

Improved hangar crane controls - added targeting display.

Replaced Sentry shoot sfx.

Replaced Menu button click sfx.

Replaced Mech foot stomp sfx.

Various small tweaks.

Fixed: Reactor balls missing electric arc lines.

Fixed: Mech no longer continues sound effect when destroyed.

Fixed: Mech no longer responds to physics forces when destroyed. 

Added first pass underfloor area to central hangar.

More randomized Sentrybot VO.
Updated EMP effect.
